text: "Fuck Love" is the third single off of American rapper XXXTentacion's debut studio album 17. The song also features rapper Trippie Redd. The song was released on January 23, 2018. The song was able to make it to #28 on the Billboard Hot 100 after XXXtentacion died in 2018. It was also certified Diamond by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). On March 29, 2019, Fuck Love was the most streamed song on SoundCloud, reaching 206 million streams. It now sits at #2. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Fuck Love" on YouTube Category:2017 songs Category:XXXTentacion songs Category:Trippie Redd songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Fuck Love
